original_title: Fatal shooting in Mallavi, Mullaitivu: 01 dead
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A person was shot dead in the Palinagar area of Mallaavi, Mullaitivu. The victim, a 23-year-old man, was fatally shot when a group of individuals entered his house and fled the scene. He succumbed to his injuries on the spot.
The police have initiated investigations to apprehend the suspects involved in the murder.
Newsline | Rubber Industry faces ruin | Emeritus Professor Asoka Nugawela | 11th July 2023

Talk of the Town | Emeritus Prof. Asoka Nugawela | Rubber Research Institute of Sri Lanka
